summary: This bill, the Digital Economy Cybersecurity Advisory Act of 2025, proposes to establish a Digital Economy and Cybersecurity Board of Advisors within the National Telecommunications and Information Administration (NTIA). The Board will advise the Assistant Secretary on cybersecurity best practices, policies to secure information and communications networks, promote innovation, and remove barriers to trust. The Board will be composed of experts from both public and private sectors. The bill also defines the Board's composition, duties, and termination date, and defines key terms.
